text: ane je loko'e potana mata-pitane kahyu ke hum tamarathi tanga avi gayo, tame mane a ja kaheta raheso ke hum mrtyu pamya pachi phari jivita karavamam avisa, mara pahela pana samudayo avi cukaya che, te banne allaha same phariyada kare che, (ane kahe che) tara mate kharabi che tum imana la'i ava, ni:Sanka allahanum vacana sacu che, te javaba ape che ke a phakata agala lokoni varta'o che
